# **Design System for writing code and documentation.**

## **Exponential**

| **Digit** | **Exponential Form** |
| :-------: | :------------------: |
|     0     |          ‚Å∞           |
|     1     |          ¬π           |
|     2     |          ¬≤           |
|     3     |          ¬≥           |
|     4     |          ‚Å¥           |
|     5     |          ‚Åµ           |
|     6     |          ‚Å∂           |
|     7     |          ‚Å∑           |
|     8     |          ‚Å∏           |
|     9     |          ‚Åπ           |
|     +     |          ‚Å∫           |
|     -     |          ‚Åª           |
|     =     |          ‚Åº           |
|     (     |          ‚ÅΩ           |
|     )     |          ‚Åæ           |
|     n     |          ‚Åø           |
|     i     |          ‚Å±           |

## **Check Marks**

| **Emoji Preview** | **GitHub Flavoured Markdown** |
| :---------------: | :---------------------------: |
|        ‚úÖ         |     `:white_check_mark:`      |
|        üî≥         |    `:white_square_button:`    |
